body:
There are two issues for this package:
1. pycairo fails to build with Python 3.8
https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1717658
2. run `python setup.py test` fail:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29532367/104799100-3c066700-5807-11eb-93be-747b1d860f48.png)

So, we need update pycairo to using the latest python and open `cairo` `pdf` variant.
title: py-pycairo: update version and fix setup.py test error
